message: Let's split it evenly, Bob.  Seems fair to me!
Alice, my turn. How about a 60/40 split in my favor? Considering the inflation, it's a good deal for you to take now.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's go with 55/45 in my favor.  I think this is a good deal for both of us, considering the inflation.
Alice, time is running out and the value is decreasing. I'll offer you 42, it's more than I think you'll get if this goes on much longer.
